themes: income and wealth eligibility for funding
key_phrases: same people or persons receive funding
not award funding to artists who make more than 80k a year
received generational wealth gifts over 1k that year
barriers_identified: repeat funding to the same recipients
funding awarded to high-income or wealthy artists
solutions_proposed: do not give repeat funding to previous winners
exclude artists making more than 80k a year from funding
exclude artists who have received generational wealth gifts over 1k that year from funding
